name: Jean
desc:
"Dandelion Knight" Jean

Never believes that she has done well enough — not until final victory is hers, anyway.

value.name: Lands of Dandelion
value.desc:
Jean: Lands of Dandelion

"Wind, hear me!"

value.text: Reward for inviting Jean to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Jean
value.desc: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 3 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> , the target is forcibly switched to the next character.

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Heals all your characters for 2 HP, summons 1 <color=#ffffff>Dandelion Field</color> .

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase</color> : Deal 1 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> , heal your active character for 1 HP.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing chracters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Swirl:</color> Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.

customize.name: Jean
customize.desc:
"Dandelion Knight" Jean

Never believes that she has done well enough — not until final victory is hers, anyway.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Alright, I'll consider this a short break from work. But I'm afraid I can't play for too long..."
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: Jean's deck centers around "Energy Recharge" and "Anemo DMG," and also features a decent amount of healing capabilities.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Jean
customize.desc:
"Dandelion Knight" Jean

Never believes that she has done well enough — not until final victory is hers, anyway.

customize.name: Barbara
customize.desc:
"Shining Idol" Barbara

Ready to heal hearts and soothe souls at any time.

customize.name: Kaeya
customize.desc:
"Frostwind Swordsman" Kaeya

Specializes in awakening knightly virtues in others.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Lands of Dandelion
customize.desc:
Jean: Lands of Dandelion

"Wind, hear me!"

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"You're doing quite well. As a player... no, as a duelist, I should show you the appropriate courtesy..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Jean" starts with the Talent Card "Lands of Dandelion" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.
